mapper.insert: insert into t_order ( order_id, goods_id, buyer, address_id, state, update_time ) values( #{orderId}, #{goodsId}, #{buyer}, #{addressId}, 0, now() )
mapper.select: SELECT order_id, t_goods.goods_id goodsId, title, url indexPath, price, shipping, t_order.buyer, image_path, user_name FROM t_goods, t_image, t_user, t_order WHERE t_goods.goods_id = t_image.goods_id AND goods_order = 0 AND t_user.user_id = t_goods.user_id AND t_order.goods_id = t_goods.goods_id AND t_order.buyer = #{buyer}
